Summary: huge swarm of 30+ starlike lights flying south to north
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a friends house for a bonfire on a saturday night. while sitting with my girlfriend and chatting with friends i noticed 4 lights (satelite sized) that made a triangle flying in a straight path over the property we were on. I noticed it at first because i always enjoy watching the sky and thought it was a satelite but never seen them so close together so i knew it was something other-worldly. I had a feeling it was a ufo but you just never really expect to get such proof. all 4 lights stayed uniform as it flew south to north overhead of myself as well as several other witnesses. I yelled "look! what's that?" astonished. as everyone just watched for maybe 15 seconds as it kept going out of sight. about a minute later, in the same flight path and direction, a swarm of at least 30 single lights all bunched together came overhead. all i could do was watch in awe as this swarm of starlike lights buzzed silently flying south to north. i distinctively remember keeping my eye on two lights that were on the outer rim of the swarm, i watched one bounce over blocking my view of the other and then back again in less then a second. all the lights just kept going at a steady speed (about that of a satelite) and disappeared out of view. I felt like i had just seen something that I will probably never get to see again. I was upset that no one had any video proof, but was super estatic to have my own proof after observing the night sky and wondering what if for so long.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Monroe
There were no other sightings in Monroe on or around August 13th 2011
